prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a rugged body and sharp features.
I want a green Pokemon that looks like a small dinosaur with a tough exterior.
Generate a bipedal creature that has a unique blend of earthy tones and fierce eyes.
Make a Pokemon that evolves into a powerful beast, showcasing strength and resilience.
Imagine a creature that thrives in mountainous terrains, with a sturdy build and defensive skills.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of nature, with vibrant colors and distinct markings.
Give me a small, fierce Pokemon with an adventurous personality and a rocky appearance.
